markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 635 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

An effect with this trait delivers a poison or deals poison damage. An item with this trait is poisonous and might cause an affliction.
name: Poison
